document.masterDocTitle: The Crabronid Wasps of the Genera Oxybelus LATREILLE 1796 and Brimocelus ARNOLD 1927 of " Biologiezentrum Linz " Collection in Linz, Austria (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Crabronidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Crabronid Wasps of the Genera Oxybelus LATREILLE 1796 and Brimocelus ARNOLD 1927 of " Biologiezentrum Linz " Collection in Linz, Austria (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Crabronidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: This species is characterized by an enormous variation of colour pattern from a complete
black body to considerable yellow-white marks on tergites, thorax and legs.
